# Footer

<br />

## `Footers` are used as the main footer for a document or page.

<br />

### Default

<Canvas>
  <Story of={FooterStories.Default} />
</Canvas>

## Usage Example

<CollapsibleJsonSnippet summary="settingsData" code={getArgs(Footer.schema().form)} />

<br />

<CollapsibleJsonSnippet summary="footerData" code={footerDataMock} />

```jsx
import Footer from '@appdirect/sfb-theme-components/src/components/footer/Footer';

<Footer data={footerData} settings={settingsData} />
```
